alert.note: Alert for Bossier; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 5:48PM CDT until June 03 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Central Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North central Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 548 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mansfield, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Coushatta, Converse, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, South Mansfield, Keachi, Noble, Grand Cane, Edgefield, Gloster, Carmel, Lake End, Evelyn, Grand Bayou, Kingston, Hanna, Loggy Bayou, Pelican and Crichton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
